list.title: How to use Husky to create pre-commit and pre-push hooks
list.description: Learn how to execute Husky to prevent git push and git commit to execute your tests, linting, formatting or whatever you want.

list.title: Learn how to target keywords with Google Trends
list.description: Identify what keywords would work better for you and learn how to segment your users with Google Trends by examples

list.title: How to improve the SEO and user experience of your website by analyzing metrics
list.description: I explain how I improved the SEO and user experience of ChooseYourPlant by analyzing some metrics and how you can do the same for your blog or community.

list.title: Chooseyourplant is a houseplant marketplace to discover and find your next plant.
list.description: Chooseyourplant is a houseplant marketplace to discover plants that match your likes as no ones has never done. Its intention is to simplify the search of plants, cares and more!
